org.jbehave.scenario.errors
Interface PendingErrorStrategy

All Superinterfaces:
ErrorStrategy
public interface PendingErrorStrategy
extends ErrorStrategy

PendingErrorStrategy allows to define how pending error are handled. Two standard strategies are provided:

  • PASSING: passes scenarios upon pending errors
  • FAILING: fails scenario upon pending errors

Field Summary
static PendingErrorStrategy FAILING
          Strategy that fails scenario upon pending errors
static PendingErrorStrategy PASSING
          Strategy that passes scenarios upon pending errors
